Package teacheasy.runtime.editor

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnswerBoxPropertiesController
    Contains code relating to editor functionality for Answer Box objects.
    AnswerProperty
    Wraps an answer object in simple properties to allow it to be included in table rows in the properties pane.
    AudioPropertiesController
    Contains code relating to editor functionality for audio objects.
    GraphicPropertiesController
    Contains code relating to editor functionality for graphics objects.
    ImagePropertiesController
    Contains code relating to editor functionality for image objects.
    LessonInfoWindow
    Creates a window to change lesson information.
    MouseController
    Contains methods relating to mouse control.
    MultipleChoicePropertiesController
    Contains code relating to editor functionality for multiple choice objects.
    NewObjectController
    Includes static methods for adding objects to a given page.
    PropertiesPane
    Encapsulates functionality relating to the properties pane of the editor.
    PropertiesUtil
    Utility class to hold functions related to properties initialisation and modification in the editor.
    TemplateController
    Contains methods for adding template pages to a lesson.
    TextPropertiesController
    Contains code relating to editor functionality for text box objects.
    URLWindow
    Creates a window to enter a URL to load online media from.
    VideoPropertiesController
    Contains code relating to editor functionality for video objects.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TemplateController.TemplateType
    Enumeration of the template types
